title: Crazy fun game mode idea
body: What if there was a game mode where all champions were their actual sizes? Or idk a game mode that's really involved with the the lore behind every champion or something. Would be suuuupppppeeeeerrrrrrr coooooooool

replies.body: Malphite would be the size of the map and yordles would be microscopic
I'm 100% aware but maybe a slightly less accurate version? Haha
So like, a normal game of league of legends?

lolol I know I know my idea is pretty bad now that I think about it.

I just really want like a lore based game mode.
